moves.1. d4 d5 2. c4 dxc4: I often accept the gambit, if things start to get hot, i merely relinquish the pawn
moves.3. Qa4+: They say you shouldn't advance your queen too early.  They're right.
moves.3... Nc6 4. Qxc4 Nxd4: I've got my eye on c2.  Just gotta get the white queen off it.
moves.5. e4 e5 6. Nd2 Be6: Start trying to chase the queen away
moves.9. Qc3 Bb4: Voila! Pretty nifty offering the B for the k-q fork
moves.10. Qd3: Didn't expect him to fall for it. But now i've got some threats
moves.11. b3: Trying to block my pawn advance, but i've got the glimmer of the final idea
moves.12... c4 13. bxc4 bxc4 14. Qb1: Worked out the rest of this final combination here. Pretty slick for me.
